name: Simpleflow
description:
⭐️ SimpleFlow makes it easy to create flowchart by clicking on two frames, have fun! (More features coming soon, stay tuned✨)


To use:

  1. Open SimpleFlow plugin
  2. Select 1 frame
  3. Select the second frame you want to connected to
  4. Flow created!
  5. Edit the styling


Feature:

👉 Flow with direction

👉 Flow automauically update

👉 label information for the flow (a box let can put some text inside)


Roadamap:

📌 add user gesture styling (tap, swipe, long press...etc)
